pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a slow-motion, close-up shot of a green water balloon exploding on a tree stump. The water is captured mid-splash, creating a dramatic, frozen-in-time effect. The scene is set outdoors with a blurred background of green foliage and a pile of cut logs.
